# Bandits Beware

| runtime        = 20 minutes
| country        = United States
| language       = SilentEnglish intertitles
}}
Bandits Beware is a 1921 American silent Western film directed by Lee Kohlmar and featuring Hoot Gibson.
Plot
Cast
* Hoot Gibson
* Charles Newton
* John Judd
* Marcella Pershing
